## Find source and headers
FILE(GLOB HEADERS *.h)
FILE(GLOB SOURCES *.c*)

IF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)
  LIST(SORT HEADERS)
  LIST(SORT SOURCES)
ENDIF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)

LIST(REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES pngtest.c)

## Build
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
  ${ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR}
)

ADD_LIBRARY(png STATIC ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})
